title: Flow-driven enhancement of neodymium and dysprosium separation from aqueous solutions
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1400-1407
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00403A, Paper
Qingpu Wang, Chinmayee V. Subban
Flow-induced non-equilibrium conditions yielded high-purity Dy precipitate from aqueous mixtures of NdCl3 and DyCl3 more quickly compared to conventional equilibrium stirred mixing.
